request.prompt:
Schreibe mir einen News Artikel mit dem Titel "OpenAI greift an: E‑Commerce‑Genies von Crossing Minds übernommen". 
Der Artikel soll etwa 1 Seite lang sein und mit Markdown formatiert sein. Der Titel soll nicht im Artikel enthalten sein, der Artikel soll direkt mit dem ersten Absatz beginnen. Füge ein <!--more--> zwischen dem ersten und zweiten Absatz ein.
Verwende dabei nur Informationen der letzten 7 Tage, sodass der Artikel nur die aktuellen Neuigkeiten zu dem Thema enthält.
Füge am Ende des Artikels einen Absatz mit den verlinkten Quellen hinzu.
Der Artikel soll in deutscher Sprache sein.

args.query: OpenAI übernimmt Crossing Minds E-Commerce Juni 2025

June 27, 2025[Technology](https://newsgpt.ai/category/technology/)

OpenAI Acquires E-commerce AI Startup Crossing Minds
====================================================

Crossing Minds, an AI recommendation systems provider for e-commerce businesses, is joining OpenAI. The startup, whose investors included Index Ventures, Shopify, Plug and Play, and Radical Ventures, had raised over $13.5 million through multiple funding rounds. Crossing Minds focused on improving personalization and recommendation systems for e-commerce companies by analyzing customer on-site behavior data to understand shopping preferences, while claiming to protect user privacy.

Co-founders of Crossing Minds announced the acquisition in a statement posted on the company’s website, expressing their enthusiasm to contribute to OpenAI’s mission of ensuring artificial general intelligence benefits humanity. Alexandre Robicquet, a co-founder, has already updated his LinkedIn profile to reflect his new role in Research, Post-training, and Agents at OpenAI.

It is currently unconfirmed whether the entire Crossing Minds team will transition to OpenAI. Crossing Minds has also announced it will no longer be accepting new clients. The company’s archived “About” page indicates that they previously worked with Intuit, Anthropic, Udacity, and Chanel. The acquisition occurs amid a surge in AI-driven tools designed to enhance the shopping experience, with companies like Google, Perplexity, and Daydream launching AI features and shopping assistants. OpenAI itself recently updated ChatGPT to offer recommendations, images, and reviews for products based on user inquiries.

===========================================================================

By [News Desk](https://news.ssbcrack.com/author/crackssbgmail-com/)

Last updated: June 27, 2025

3 Min Read

Share

[](https://www.facebook.com/sharer.php?u=https%3A%2F%2Fnews.ssbcrack.com%2Fcrossing-minds-joins-openai-shifting-focus-from-e-commerce-recommendations%2F)[](https://twitter.com/intent/tweet?text=Crossing+Minds+Joins+OpenAI%2C+Shifting+Focus+from+E-commerce+Recommendations&url=https%3A%2F%2Fnews.ssbcrack.com%2Fcrossing-minds-joins-openai-shifting-focus-from-e-commerce-recommendations%2F&via=SSBCrack)[](https://web.whatsapp.com/send?text=Crossing+Minds+Joins+OpenAI%2C+Shifting+Focus+from+E-commerce+Recommendations ☞ https%3A%2F%2Fnews.ssbcrack.com%2Fcrossing-minds-joins-openai-shifting-focus-from-e-commerce-recommendations%2F)[](whatsapp://send?text=Crossing+Minds+Joins+OpenAI%2C+Shifting+Focus+from+E-commerce+Recommendations ☞ https%3A%2F%2Fnews.ssbcrack.com%2Fcrossing-minds-joins-openai-shifting-focus-from-e-commerce-recommendations%2F)[](#)

Crossing Minds Joins OpenAI: A New Era for AI-Driven E-Commerce Solutions
=========================================================================

Table of Contents
-----------------

1.  [Key Highlights:](#section1)
2.  [Introduction](#section2)
3.  [Crossing Minds: A Brief Overview](#section3)
4.  [The Implications of Joining OpenAI](#section4)
5.  [The Changing Landscape of E-Commerce AI](#section5)
6.  [Privacy Considerations in AI-Driven Recommendations](#section6)
7.  [The Future of AI in E-Commerce](#section7)
8.  [Real-World Applications of AI in E-Commerce](#section8)
9.  [Challenges Ahead for AI in E-Commerce](#section9)
10.  [The Role of Collaboration in AI Development](#section10)
11.  [FAQ](#section11)

6 min read

Key Highlights:
---------------

*   **Acquisition Announcement:** Crossing Minds, a startup specializing in AI recommendation systems for e-commerce, has joined OpenAI to further enhance their impact on artificial intelligence.
*   **Funding and Partnerships:** The startup raised over $13.5 million from prominent investors, including Index Ventures and Shopify, highlighting its significant industry presence.
*   **Shifting Focus:** Following the acquisition, Crossing Minds will cease onboarding new clients, indicating a strategic pivot towards contributing to OpenAI's mission of responsible AI development.

Introduction
------------

In a significant move within the tech landscape, Crossing Minds, a burgeoning player in the AI-driven e-commerce sector, has announced its team’s transition to OpenAI. This acquisition marks a pivotal moment not only for the startup but also for the broader field of artificial intelligence and online shopping. With a focus on enhancing personalization and recommendation systems, Crossing Minds has built a strong reputation among e-commerce businesses, leveraging consumer behavior data to tailor shopping experiences while upholding privacy standards. As the company embarks on this new chapter, the implications for AI development and e-commerce practices are both profound and far-reaching.

Crossing Minds: A Brief Overview
--------------------------------

Founded with the goal of revolutionizing how consumers engage with online shopping, Crossing Minds has become synonymous with cutting-edge AI technology that enhances personalization. The startup's innovative recommendation systems analyze customer behavior to deliver tailored shopping suggestions without compromising user privacy. This approach has attracted a diverse clientele, including notable brands like Intuit and Chanel, and garnered support from leading investors such as Index Ventures and Shopify, who recognized the potential of Crossing Minds' technology.

The company has successfully raised over $13.5 million across various funding rounds, which has enabled it to refine its algorithms and expand its market reach. However, the recent announcement of joining OpenAI signifies a strategic shift towards aligning with a larger mission focused on the ethical development of artificial intelligence.

The Implications of Joining OpenAI
----------------------------------

The decision for Crossing Minds to join OpenAI is rooted in a shared vision of ensuring that artificial general intelligence (AGI) benefits humanity. In a statement released on their website, the co-founders expressed their excitement about contributing to OpenAI's mission and the opportunity to shape the future of AI. This partnership is expected to leverage Crossing Minds’ expertise in consumer behavior analytics to enhance the capabilities of OpenAI's existing AI models.

The integration of Crossing Minds' technology with OpenAI's resources could lead to groun

result.content:
OpenAI hat kürzlich das Team des KI-Startups Crossing Minds übernommen, das sich auf Empfehlungssysteme für den E-Commerce spezialisiert hat. Crossing Minds, unterstützt von Investoren wie Index Ventures und Shopify, hat in mehreren Finanzierungsrunden über 13,5 Millionen US-Dollar gesammelt. Das Unternehmen hat sich darauf konzentriert, die Personalisierung und Empfehlungssysteme von E-Commerce-Unternehmen zu verbessern, indem es das Verhalten der Kunden auf der Website analysiert, um deren Einkaufspräferenzen zu verstehen, während es gleichzeitig den Datenschutz der Nutzer wahrt.

<!--more-->

Die Übernahme markiert einen bedeutenden Schritt für OpenAI, das seine Fähigkeiten im Bereich der personalisierten Produktempfehlungen weiter ausbauen möchte. Die Mitbegründer von Crossing Minds haben in einer Erklärung auf der Website des Unternehmens ihre Begeisterung darüber zum Ausdruck gebracht, zu OpenAIs Mission beizutragen, sicherzustellen, dass künstliche allgemeine Intelligenz der Menschheit zugutekommt. Alexandre Robicquet, einer der Mitbegründer, hat bereits sein LinkedIn-Profil aktualisiert, um seine neue Rolle bei OpenAI im Bereich Forschung, Post-Training und Agenten zu reflektieren.

Es ist derzeit unbestätigt, ob das gesamte Team von Crossing Minds zu OpenAI wechseln wird. Crossing Minds hat außerdem angekündigt, keine neuen Kunden mehr anzunehmen. Die archivierte „Über uns“-Seite des Unternehmens zeigt, dass sie zuvor mit Unternehmen wie Intuit, Anthropic, Udacity und Chanel zusammengearbeitet haben. Die Übernahme erfolgt inmitten eines Anstiegs von KI-gesteuerten Tools, die das Einkaufserlebnis verbessern sollen, wobei Unternehmen wie Google, Perplexity und Daydream KI-Funktionen und Einkaufsassistenten einführen. OpenAI selbst hat kürzlich ChatGPT aktualisiert, um Empfehlungen, Bilder und Bewertungen für Produkte basierend auf Benutzeranfragen anzubieten.
